featured.text: But what they do not realize is that overtreatment—too many scans, too many blood tests, too many procedures—may pose harm.
The Icelandic project, from which this pioneering procedure emerged, strives for making a fundamental change in the marine industry.
The procedure for evaluating a dog’s intellect on Dognition.
What does “this pioneering procedure” in the second paragraph refer to? (A) 100% Fish’s mission.

definition.zh_def: 程序；一系列步驟或行動的過程。
definition.en_def: A series of actions or steps taken to achieve a particular end.
definition.example: The procedure for applying for a visa can be quite complicated.
